Package edu.ntnu.idatt2106_09.backend.service.household

Class HouseholdServiceImplementation

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt2106_09.backend.service.household.HouseholdServiceImplementation
All Implemented Interfaces:
HouseholdService
@Service public class HouseholdServiceImplementation extends Object implements HouseholdService
The HouseholdServiceImplementation class is responsible for implementing the logic for managing Household in the application. It allows for updating, adding, retrieving and deleting households from the database.

    • getHouseholdById

      public Optional<Household> getHouseholdById(Long householdId)
      Retrieves the household with the given ID from the database, if it exists.
      Specified by:
      getHouseholdById in interface HouseholdService
      Parameters:
      householdId - the ID of the household to retrieve
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the household with the given ID, or an empty Optional if no household is found

    • getHouseholdByIdAsDto

      public Optional<HouseholdDtoForHouseholdService> getHouseholdByIdAsDto(Long householdId)
      Retrieves a Household with the specified id as a DTO object.
      Specified by:
      getHouseholdByIdAsDto in interface HouseholdService
      Parameters:
      householdId - the id of the Household to retrieve.
      Returns:
      an Optional object containing a DTO representation of the Household if it exists, or an empty Optional if it does not. If an error occurs while retrieving the Household, an empty Optional is returned. The DTO contains the Household's id, name, invitation number, Fridge object (as a FridgeDtoWithoutHousehold), and Shoppinglist object (as a ShoppinglistDto). If the Household has no associated Fridge or Shoppinglist, the corresponding DTO object is null.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the specified id is null.

    • getHouseholdByUserId

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<HouseholdDtoForHouseholdService> getHouseholdByUserId(Integer userId)
      Retrieves a HouseholdDtoForHouseholdService object for the household associated with the given user id.
      Specified by:
      getHouseholdByUserId in interface HouseholdService
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user whose household should be retrieved
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity object with the retrieved HouseholdDtoForHouseholdService object in the body if the user and their household are found, or a not found response if the user is not found

    • addUserToHousehold

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserDto> addUserToHousehold(Long invitationNr, Integer userId)
      Adds a user to a household with the given invitation number.
      Specified by:
      addUserToHousehold in interface HouseholdService
      Parameters:
      invitationNr - the invitation number of the household to add the user to
      userId - the id of the user to be added to the household
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with the updated UserDto object
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - if no household with the given invitation number or user with the given id exists

    • createHousehold

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<HouseholdDtoForHouseholdService> createHousehold(Integer userId, HouseholdDtoForHouseholdService householdDto)
      Creates a new household and saves it to the database. Assigns the current user as a member of the new household. Generates a unique invitation number for the household and creates a new fridge and shopping list for it.
      Specified by:
      createHousehold in interface HouseholdService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the current user
      householdDto - the DTO containing the data for the new household to be created
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the DTO for the newly created household and a HTTP status code indicating successor failure of the request

    • updateHousehold

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<HouseholdDtoForHouseholdService> updateHousehold(Long householdId, HouseholdDtoForHouseholdService householdDto)
      Updates an existing household with the provided id using the provided household DTO object. If the household with the provided id does not exist, a 404 Not Found response is returned.
      Specified by:
      updateHousehold in interface HouseholdService
      Parameters:
      householdId - The id of the household to be updated
      householdDto - The DTO object containing the updated household data
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity A response entity with the updated household DTO object if the update was successful, or a 404 Not Found response if the household with the provided id does not exist

    • getAllUsersInHousehold

      public Set<UserDto> getAllUsersInHousehold(Long householdId)
      Returns a set of UserDto objects containing information about all users in the household with the specified household ID. If the household is found, it retrieves all users associated with the household and maps their information to a UserDto object, which is then added to a set of UserDto objects. If an error occurs while retrieving the users, an error message is logged and an empty set is returned.
      Specified by:
      getAllUsersInHousehold in interface HouseholdService
      Parameters:
      householdId - the ID of the household to retrieve users from
      Returns:
      a set of UserDto objects containing information about all users in the household, or an empty set if an error occurs
